import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './App.css'; class App extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { firstName: "", lastName: "", age: "", gender: "", destination: "", dietaryRestrictions: { isVegan: false, isKosher: false, isLactoseFree: false, }, } this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); } handleChange(event) { const {name, value, type, checked} = event.target type === "checkbox" ? this.setState({[name]: checked}) : this.setState({[name]: value}) } render() { return (









Entered information

Your name: {this.state.firstName} {this.state.lastName}

Your age: {this.state.age}

Your gender: {this.state.gender}

Your destination: {this.state.destination}

Your dietary restrictions: {/* {this.state.dietaryRestrictions} */}

); }; } export default App;
